prompts.prompt: What’s a dream you’ve had recently that you still remember?
Can you think of a favorite memory from when you were younger?
What’s something cool you noticed today?
Did anything tricky come up today?
How did you handle the tricky stuff?
What’s the best thing that happened today?
What’s something you’re looking forward to tomorrow?
What’s a big goal you have for the future?
Can you remember a time when you felt really happy? What happened?
Who is someone that made a big difference in your life? How did they help you?
